===RL-Glue===    
RL-Glue (Reinforcement Learning Glue) provides a standard interface that allows you to connect reinforcement learning agents, environments, and experiment programs together, even if they are written in different languages. Python RL-Glue Codec, a software library provides socket-compatibility with the RL-Glue.
Requires: Python (works faster with Numpy)
[http://glue.rl-community.org/wiki/Main_Page link]  [http://videolectures.net/mloss08_tanner_rlgcg/ video]
